alert.note: Alert for Clark (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued October 01 at 6:26PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southern Nevada, including the following county, Clark. * WHEN...Until 830 PM PDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 624 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated moderate to heavy rain due to thunderstorms moving through the south central part of the Las Vegas Valley. Minor flooding is already occurring in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Las Vegas, Henderson, Enterprise, Mountains Edge, Spring Valley, Southern Highlands, Blue Diamond, Sloan, Silverado Ranch. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
